text.#text: The purposes of this subtitle are—

to reform and
			 reorient the industrial efficiency programs of the

to establish a
			 clear and consistent authority for industrial efficiency programs of the

to accelerate the
			 development and demonstration of technologies that will assist the deployment
			 goals of the industrial efficiency programs of the

to stimulate

			 competitiveness; and

to strengthen
			 partnerships between Federal and State governmental agencies and the private
			 and academic sectors.
